ex.util.pr
Class PR_Evidence

java.lang.Object
  ex.util.pr.PR_Evidence
Direct Known Subclasses:
PR_EvidenceGroup
public class PR_Evidence
extends java.lang.Object

Represents an evidence that indicates whether some object should be classified as class A or not. Example evidence indicating that some phrase should be classified as a monitor name could be a content pattern "LCD " with precision 0.95 and recall 0.30 (PR)

Author:
Martin Labsky labsky@vse.cz
